title.en: Practical Works in Physics of Materials I. Mechanics and Heat

description.en: The practical works include determination of the modulus of elasticity and torsion, Brinell hardness, thermal expansion coefficient, specific heat capacity and thermal conductivity of various materials,  and the moments of inertia for some bodies.
description.et: Praktikumis m‰‰ratakse materjalide elastsusmoodulit, nihkemoodulit, Brinelli kıvadust, soojuspaisumistegurit, erisoojust ja soojusjuhtivust  ning vedeliku viskoossust.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to teach the mechanical and thermal behaviour of various materials, to show the methods of determination of the characteristics of materials, and to give some experience of laboratory work.
objectives.et: Eesm‰rgiks on tutvustada materjalide ja objektide mehhaaniliste ja soojuslike omaduste  mııtmise meetodeid  ning anda laboritˆˆ kogemusi nende omaduste m‰‰ramisel.

learning_outcomes.en: After passing the course a student:
1) knows mechanical and thermal behaviour of materials and standard methods for determination of the characteristics;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) teab materjalide mehhaanilisi ja soojuslikke omadusi ja nende m‰‰ramise standardseid meetodeid;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) has practical experience of measuring and determination of mechanical and thermal characteristics of materials;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) omab materjalide mehhaaniliste ja  soojuslike omaduste praktilise m‰‰ramise kogemust ja tunneb vastavaid teooriaid;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) can record and process experiment data in case of the topics covered in the course, and present  results.
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab katset protokollida, k‰sitletud teemade raames katseandmeid tˆˆdelda ja tulemusi esitada.
